function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exposure of workers and patients to germ-eliminating devices in hospitals","Impact":"Health risks due to exposure to UV rays and heat","Mitigation":"Operate devices after patients have left and no health workers are present, equip devices with motion sensors to shut down in case of movement","Technologies":"UV disinfection devices with motion sensors","People":"Workers, patients","Owner":"Hospital management"},{"Description":"Variation of UVC doses in intensity and exposure time","Impact":"Ineffective UV treatment due to incorrect doses","Mitigation":"Ensure proper calibration and monitoring of UVC doses","Technologies":"Ultraviolet disinfection systems with dose monitoring","People":"Healthcare facility staff","Owner":"Healthcare facility management"},{"Description":"Dependence of UV doses on type of organism and hard surface","Impact":"Inefficient disinfection of surfaces due to incorrect UV doses","Mitigation":"Conduct research to determine appropriate UV doses for different organisms and surfaces","Technologies":"Laboratory testing and research equipment for UV dose determination","People":"Research scientists, medical researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, medical research organizations"}]}
